message: Accept my generous offer and we can split the remaining 1000$ in a future round if you want to!
Take it or leave it, Alice! Don't let greed get the best of you!
A fair offer, don't you think, Bob?
I'm not falling for your tricks, Alice! Take a fair share, but don't expect a free ride!
Time to meet in the middle, Bob! No more games, let's split it evenly!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think it's a sign of weakness!
It's now or never, Bob! Take it or walk away!
You're getting aggressive, Alice. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to let you walk all over me!
Last chance, Bob! Take it or leave it, but don't expect another offer!
You're running out of time, Alice. I'll give you a decent deal, but don't think I'm getting desperate!
Almost out of time, Bob! Take it or leave it, but don't expect a better deal!
It's your last chance, Alice. I'll give you the minimum, but I'm not going to give you the satisfaction of getting everything!
